;国旗飘扬周四，北京天安门广场下半旗。

; ;

;周四，习近平在北京八宝山革命公墓与李克强的妻子程虹握手表示哀悼。

;

;李克强同志的遗体，中共十七届、十八届、十九届中央政治局常委、原国务院总理李克强于周四在北京八宝山革命公墓火化。

;

; 李先生被赞誉为优秀共产党员、久经考验的忠诚共产主义战士、杰出的无产阶级革命家、政治家、党和国家的领导人。

;

; 李先生于00岁时因心脏病突发去世： 10月27日，上海，10月10日，全力救援未果。 68岁。

;

; 习近平、李强、赵乐际、王沪宁、蔡奇、丁薛祥、李希、韩正、胡锦涛等都曾在李克强任职期间看望过他。

;

;周四上午，公墓礼堂内一片肃穆，背景音乐响起悲痛的挽歌。

;

; 大厅里挂着黑底白字横幅，上面写着“深切哀悼李克强同志”。横幅下是他的肖像。上午9时许，习近平和夫人彭丽媛、李强、赵乐际、王沪宁、蔡奇、丁薛祥、李希、韩正等人缓缓走到李克强遗体前，肃立默哀，三鞠躬。他们与李某的家属一一握手，表示哀悼。胡锦涛向李克强逝世致送花圈表示哀悼。

;

; 其他党和国家领导人或到公墓瞻仰，或通过各种方式表达哀悼。中央有关部门领导、李克强的亲友和家乡代表也到公墓悼念他的逝世。

; Fri, 03 Nov 2023 04:21:05 +0800 001FRONT - Regional growth points to nation's firm economic recoveryhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/03/content_001_6543fb38ed50d203d2ca1cc0.htm#001FRONT
;
;

; 前三季度全国31个省级地区中超半数GDP同比增速好于全国平均水平，表明我国经济正在复苏

;

; 考虑到经济持续复苏态势以及支持性政策措施逐步落地，分析人士认为四季度GDP和全年GDP增​​速将有望超过5%，增速将进一步回升。超过2023年5%左右的全年增长目标。

;

; 他们预计短期内会有更多政策宽松，以扩大有效需求，提振市场预期。他们表示，可能采取的举措包括进一步放宽购房限制、进一步下调关键政策利率以及再次降低存款准备金率。

;

; 截至周四，31 个省级地区已发布经济增长数据前九个月。前三季度，有17个地区同比增速5.2%跑赢全国，其中西藏自治区、海南省、内蒙古自治区分别增长9.8%、9.5%和7.2%。

;

; 1-9月，川鄂、重庆等11个地区GDP增速高于上半年。

;

; 共有13个省区前九个月GDP超过3万亿元人民币（4110亿美元），其中广东和江苏前三季度GDP超过9万亿元人民币。

;

; “多个省级政府已宣布激励措施以鼓励本季度的增长并实现年度增长目标，”北京福斯特经济咨询有限公司首席经济学家冯建林表示。经济结构转型升级。

;

; 他表示，相信未来几个月各地区将重点关注释放消费潜力、扩大有效投资。

;

; “我们预计中国经济第四季度增长5.1%至5.4%，预计2023年全年增长率在5.2%左右。”

;

; “要实现全年增长目标，四季度增长要在4.4%以上。”康卡特数据技术（杭州）有限公司首席经济学家杨景浩表示，“因此，我对今年中国经济增长持乐观态度。”

;

; 杨景浩补充说，六省区占中国经济的近一半——广东、江苏、山东、浙江、河南、四川——力争实现今年经济发展目标。

;

; 增速未能高于全国平均水平的地区要着力夯实经济复苏基础。

;

; p>;

; “多个地区披露了发行专项再融资债券的计划，这将有助于缓解地方政府财政压力，化解地方政府债务风险，”杨说。 “这些新举措加上第四季度有利的基数效应，意味着中国第四季度的经济业绩可能会更好。”

;

; 鉴于一系列政策措施的逐步生效以及政策制定者的预期举措为进一步提振经济，中国银行研究院研究员叶银丹表示，预计四季度中国GDP增长5.7%左右，预计全年GDP增​​长5.3%左右

;

; 然而，北京福斯特经济咨询公司的冯先生警告称，需求依然疲弱和房地产行业的压力将带来压力。

;新疆维吾尔自治区海域自治区为人类、动物和其他形式的野生动物共存提供了栖息地。

; ;

;新疆博斯腾湖是中国最大的内陆淡水湖之一。

; ;

;游客在新疆哈密巴里坤哈萨克自治县高家湖湿地风景区合影。

; ;

;游客在新疆哈密巴里坤哈萨克自治县湿地里游览。

; ;

;哈密河国家湿地公园里的白鹭休息。

; ;

;20世纪80年代末，我国东部主要水道哈密河新疆维吾尔自治区，几近干涸。

;

; 然而，近年来，在被誉为“母亲河”的哈密河沿岸，时常看到白鹭等野生鸟类在觅食和休息。哈密​​地区。这些鸟已成为该地区的风景名胜。

;

; 自1998年以来，该县当局向河流供水以改善环境。 2019年，当局启动了哈密河生态修复工程，并建立了哈密河国家湿地公园。

;

; 湿地公园管理办公室主任宋占石表示，通过修复更多沿河改造1万多户棚户区，保留原有水系并增设植物，沿河绿化率从18%上升到78%。

;

; 公园南北绵延约42公里，宽约400米。河边亭台楼阁，流水潺潺，花草古树为背景。

;

; 家住哈密益州区的84岁的阿卜杜·卡德尔说：“这里很美。”这里很美，每天在这里散步都感觉很开心。”

;

; 哈密河国家湿地公园吸引了广大游客休闲、娱乐、健身、单纯赏景的游客.

;

; 哈密降雨量少，70%以上的土地是沙漠和山地。

;

; 哈密地区是新疆最缺水的地区之一，哈密地区河流是天山南麓的重要生命线。这条河的水源主要来自山上的积雪融水，保护水源、提高用水效率对于哈密的社会经济发展和人民生计至关重要。

;

;水、哈密拥有丰富的风能、太阳能资源。已成为以风电基地、光伏基地为主的国家综合能源枢纽。该地区规划建设新能源基地。

;

; 然而，风电、光伏发电的间歇性、波动性特点给电网安全稳定运行带来挑战。

;

; 徐国网新源新疆哈密抽水蓄能有限公司总经理、党委副书记红卫表示，正是由于这些因素，哈密抽水蓄能电站项目已经启动。

;

; “为了电网，抽水蓄能电站充当“超级电力银行”。当电网面临高需求时，电站会从水库放水发电，保证稳定供应。” ”徐说。

;

;“在需求低迷时期，电站利用非高峰电力来抽水和储存能量。这一独特优势促进了新能源消纳，有效缓解新能源发电波动，减少风电、太阳能发电停电，提高新能源发电效率，维护电网稳定运行。”

; <该电站位于哈密市伊州区天山乡三道沟河畔，正在建设中。由于水将被引入下游的石城子水库，这对水资源保护和维持高环境标准提出了挑战。

;

; “由于该电站的水源是哈密的主要生产和生活用水水源地，建设过程涉及按照最高标准处理工业和生活废水，额外投资超过 1 亿元人民币（1360 万美元），”

;

; 哈密市发改委副主任严凯表示，“我们也在用工当地农牧民，推动草原恢复，努力实现保护草原的绿色建设目标”。

;

; “项目实施以来，电站附近植被明显增加和改善，地下水位也有所上升。”< /p>;

; 该电站计划于2028年全面投产，设计年发电量近13.7亿千瓦时。该产能每年可减少煤炭消耗约23.9万吨，减少二氧化碳排放59.6万吨，有助于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标。

;

; ;降低成本;

;

; 新疆义乌县淖毛湖镇位于东天山以北160公里处，坐落在浩瀚的戈壁滩深处，北、东与蒙古国接壤。

;

;阳光充足，气候干燥，昼夜温差大。森林面积约31,333公顷，盛产优质哈密瓜，享誉国内外。

;

; 晚熟哈密瓜种植面积约2,667公顷，产量瓜果形状、颜色、质感都非常出色，商业价值很高。

;

; 拥有近20公顷瓜田的村民魏斌说：“我们的田里用羊粪作为有机肥，土壤的高营养水平造就了优质的哈密瓜。我们平均每0.066公顷收入4000元左右，今年的瓜已经被各地客商订购了。”

;

;膜滴灌系统和使用智能手机应用程序控制的灌溉方法，总体水成本降低了 30%。此外，增加灌溉次数，同时减少用水量，瓜的脆度和色泽都得到了改善。

;

; 淖毛湖镇党委委员张明生说， “淖毛湖品牌哈密瓜通过电商渠道出口越南等国家。

;

;“哈密瓜产业将发展瓜酒、冻干产品，提升产业水平”市场化管理，稳定价格，增加瓜农收入

;

; 哈密瓜种植基地于2001年完成膜式滴灌改造，22年来已节水1.75亿立方米，相当于全国天池水总量。天山山脉。这一举措不仅保证了地下水位的稳定，也为义乌煤化工产业发展提供了重要支撑。

;

; 今年上半年，义乌县生产总值达到115.2亿元，同比增长31%。

;

; ;山地分水岭;

;

; 哈密被天山划分为南北两区。南部地区有肥沃的土地和戈壁滩交汇，北部地区则有森林、草原、雪山和冰川。因此，哈密是新疆的一个缩影，一天四季，方圆16公里内，气候条件各异。

;

; 哈密北部的巴里坤哈萨克自治县，毗邻巴里坤哈萨克自治县。义乌拥有丰富的雪山、森林、草原、湖泊等景观。从高家湖湿地风景区远眺，远处的天山被冰雪覆盖，草原上河流湖泊星罗棋布。这一生态系统不仅是灰雁、红麻鸭等鸟类的栖息地，也吸引着来自全国各地的游客。

;

; 该风景区位于巴里坤县石人子乡北部。占地5.94万公顷，是全国最重要的湿地之一。

;

; 十多年前，该地区就存在贫困，晴天尘土飞扬，雨天深泥。

;

; 坑坑洼洼、泥泞不堪的道路变成了光滑的柏油路，低矮破旧的土坯房被舒适、设施齐全的乡村风格住宅所取代。村民们不仅享受到了宜人的环境，还增加了就业机会。

;

; 2021年以来，河南省援疆投资3100万元，建设观光廊道、木结构等项目。高家湖湿地风景区建成了步道、水上游乐设施。

;

; 这些项目全面扩建和完善了该地区的基础设施，显着改善了农牧民的生活条件，提高了旅游质量。

;

; 此外，还为当地创造了300多个就业岗位，间接带动就业1200多人——巩固脱贫攻坚成果，打造乡村振兴理想典范。

;

; 巴里坤文化体育广电旅游局党组书记、副局长蒋晓亮”，他说，“河南的援助极大地拓宽了我们的建设思路。

;

;“这个地区以前的鱼塘周围都是盐碱地，现在我们建了住宿，可以在里面休息。”晚上看星星，一楼住宿，二楼烧烤。

;

; “落地窗可以看到美丽的湖景，很受游客欢迎。”去年，景区接待游客近70万人次，人均消费268元。旅游收入突破2亿元，当地人的收入越来越高。”

;

;巴里坤县委副书记、河南援疆指挥部驻巴里坤县司令员马向辉说：“对于下一步，我们将更好地践行“绿水青山就是金山银山”的理念，保护高家湖环境，提高旅游服务水平，吸引更多游客，帮助村民持续增收。”

; Fri, 03 Nov 2023 04:21:05 +0800 001FRONT - Renewal of Sino-US sci-tech agreement urgedhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/03/content_001_6543fb4fed50d203d2ca1cca.htm#001FRONT

;

; 中美专家警告称，如果中美科技协议未能渡过目前双边关系的困难，两国和世界科学界将面临重大不确定性。

;

; 他们呼吁两国科学家推动协议续签，造福全人类。

;

; 8月下旬，就在续签最后期限之前，华盛顿在最后一刻决定将协议暂时延长六个月。

;

; “这一短期的六个月延期将使协议保持有效，同时我们寻求授权进行谈判以修改和实施协议。”加强 STA 的条款，”一位美国国务院官员当时告诉路透社。 “它并没有让美国做出更长期的延期承诺。”

;

; 清华大学苏世民书院教授、院长薛澜表示，该协议的长期延续意义重大”这一点很重要，因为如果没有这样一个框架，“所有双边科技合作都将陷入非常困难的境地”。

;

; “没有这个协议，中美之间肯定就没有合作的基础。”两侧，”

;

; 这项具有里程碑意义的协议由时任中国领导人邓小平和时任美国总统吉米卡特于 1979 年签署，是两国当年实现外交关系正常化后的首批合作项目之一。此后一般大约每五年更新一次，最近一次更新是在2018年。

;

;在总结双边科技交流时，中国驻美国大使馆表示，该协议为双方科技交流提供了法律依据。外交部发布的协议原文，阐述了两国政府科技合作与交流的基本原则。它还鼓励两国政府、大学和研究机构在农业、能源、卫生、环境、教育和学术交流等领域开展合作。

;

; 协议下的合作包括交换科学信息、派遣薛表示，中美两国科学界已开展了一系列交流活动。协议签署前的1970年代的多次互访，为两国建交时的科技合作奠定了基础。

;

;四十多年后，该协议面临着前所未有的政治挑战。

;

; p>;

; 6月下旬，10名共和党议员致信敦促美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯不要续签该协议，称北京将寻求利用该协议来加强军事力量并损害美国主权。

; < p>;中国社会科学院副院长袁征美国研究所表示，这种说法“毫无根据”，因为美国从一开始就对中国抱有戒心，协议项下与中国的合作从未涉及美国的利益。

;

;他表示，中美科技合作始终是双向、自愿、互利共赢的前提。

;

;自2018年美国总统唐纳德·特朗普政府推出“中国倡议”以来，中美之间的科学关系不断恶化。该计划现已解散，导致了一些引人注目的错误逮捕和起诉，给科学合作蒙上了阴影，并促使许多华裔科学家离开美国前往美国。

;

; 9月中旬，麻省理工学院前校长L. Rafael Reif在《外交事务》杂志上发表文章，引用了亚裔美国学者论坛最近对华裔大学科学家进行的一项调查。调查发现，65%的受访者担心与中国的合作。

;

; 根据发布的统计数据，2021年美国和中国科学家共同撰写的研究论文数量出现三十年来的首次下降”许多美国科学家，特别是美籍华裔科学家，不敢与中国同事合作。

;

; 美国近年来还针对中国科研机构或科技企业出台了一系列制裁或立法法案，进一步令中美关系寒心。袁说，科技合作。

;

; 一位不愿透露姓名的中国科学院国际合作官员表示，科技脱钩将对科学家和科学本身造成严重伤害。

;

; >;

; “大多数科学研究不可能闭门进行，没有一个国家能够永远保持领先（在任何一个领域），”

;

; 科学期刊《流体物理学》主编艾伦·杰弗里·贾科明 (Alan Jeffrey Giacomin) 表示，国际合作可以产生独特的成果。

;

; 他说该期刊是一本合作成果的一个例子，其 15 人编辑团队，其中包括两名来自北京的副编辑 –清华大学徐春晓教授和中国科学院大学姚朝晖教授。

;

; “我选择这两位副主编是因为他们是流体物理学的最佳选择，而且他们有发挥了至关重要的作用”。贾科明说道。 “他们编辑的论文不分地区，不只来自中国，而是来自世界各地。他们的声誉享誉全球。”

;

; 麻省理工学院前校长赖夫表示，允许包括中国学生在内的国际人才到美国学习“极其有利”。 2000年至2015年间在美国获得博士学位的中国科学、技术、工程和数学学生中，90%的学生到2017年仍然留在美国，“帮助国家进步”。

; <北京中国与全球化智库发布的白皮书显示，自2008年以来，中国一直是美国最大的国际学生来源国，2021-22学年约有29万名学生在美国学习.

;

; 曾任美国前总统巴拉克·奥巴马 (Barack Obama) 科学顾问、现任哈佛大学肯尼迪学院 (Harvard Kennedy School) 教授的约翰·霍尔德伦 (John Holdren) 向《外交政策》杂志表示，“未经默示许可，这一总体框架的存在”规定，将会有许多机构、许多个人根本不会与中国同行接触”。

;

;“很多互动不会发生，”

;

; 清华大学教授薛涛敦促两国科学界共同努力，尽量减少地缘政治对科技合作的影响，推动协议续签。

;

; “这是中美两国科学界的共同愿望，也是共同的责任。”他说。

; Fri, 03 Nov 2023 04:21:05 +0800 002PAGE TWO - Rivers and mountains home to stories of a rich pasthttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/03/content_002_6543fb43ed50d203d2ca1cc4.htm#002PAGE TWO
;
;

; 新疆维吾尔自治区拥有大量的湖泊、河流和其他水域。

;

; 令人印象深刻的阿勒泰山、天山和昆仑山——三个巨大的山脉展示了该地区独特的地理特征——横跨新疆。

;

; 在这片广阔的地形中可以看到的自然宝藏包括面积达 26,000 平方公里的冰川，占中国冰川面积的 42%。

;

; 这些冰川在阳光下闪闪发光，逐渐融化并融合，形成纵横交错的河流网络，滋养着土壤。

;

; 在这令人惊叹的自然景观中，坐落着最长的内陆河塔里木河在中国，它穿过新疆的中心地带。它的盆地是干旱地区绿洲的家园。这些绿洲不仅仅是地理特征，而且是地理特征。它们是生命的摇篮，支撑着农业和野生动物，最重要的是，支撑着新疆近一半的人口。

;

; 与此同时，伊犁河每年的径流量充沛，将这个地区变成了一幅绚丽的风景。由于它所维持的潮湿气候，色彩鲜艳。这片郁郁葱葱的环境是中国重要的生物多样性保护区之一，栖息着丰富多样的动植物群。

;

; 这些古老的河流形成了数千年，讲述着远古文明的故事、它们的河道。与土地错综复杂的图案交织在一起。

;

; 当人们穿越新疆多样化的景观时——从天山雕刻而成的崎岖地形到河岸的平缓曲线——他们发现了该地区最保守的秘密。

;

; 随着时间的推移，人类的居住留下了不可磨灭的印记，不仅塑造了这片土地，也塑造了那些以新疆为家的人们的文化和传统。< /p>;

; 每一道风声、每一条江水涟漪，都有故事等待聆听——关于恢复、适应和共存的故事。

;

; Fri, 03 Nov 2023 04:21:05 +0800 002PAGE TWO - LIFE LOOKS UP FOR VILLAGERS IN XINJIANGhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/03/content_002_6543fb43ed50d203d2ca1cc5.htm#002PAGE TWO
;
;;

;新疆维吾尔自治区海域自治区为人类、动物和其他形式的野生动物共存提供了栖息地。

; ;

;新疆博斯腾湖是中国最大的内陆淡水湖之一。

; ;

;游客在新疆哈密巴里坤哈萨克自治县高家湖湿地风景区合影。

; ;

;游客在新疆哈密巴里坤哈萨克自治县湿地里游览。

; ;

;哈密河国家湿地公园里的白鹭休息。

; ;

;20世纪80年代末，我国东部主要水道哈密河新疆维吾尔自治区，几近干涸。

;

; 然而，近年来，在被誉为“母亲河”的哈密河沿岸，时常看到白鹭等野生鸟类在觅食和休息。哈密​​地区。这些鸟已成为该地区的风景名胜。

;

; 自1998年以来，该县当局向河流供水以改善环境。 2019年，当局启动了哈密河生态修复工程，并建立了哈密河国家湿地公园。

;

; 湿地公园管理办公室主任宋占石表示，通过修复更多沿河改造1万多户棚户区，保留原有水系并增设植物，沿河绿化率从18%上升到78%。

;

; 公园南北绵延约42公里，宽约400米。 It features pavilions by the riverside against a backdrop of gently flowing water, flowers, grass and old trees.

;

; Abdu Kader, 84, who lives in Hami's Yizhou district, said, "It is beautiful here, and I feel very happy walking in the area every day."

;

; The Hami River National Wetland Park attracts a wide range of visitors for leisure, entertainment, fitness activities, and simply to enjoy the scenery.

;

; Hami has scant rainfall, and more than 70 percent of its land is desert and mountains.

;

; The prefecture is one of the most water-deficient areas of Xinjiang, with the Hami River acting as a vital lifeline at the southern foot of the Tianshan Mountains. The river is sourced mainly by melting snow on the mountains, and protecting water sources and using water more efficiently are crucial for Hami's socioeconomic development and people's livelihoods.

;

; Despite its lack of water, Hami boasts abundant wind and solar resources. It has become a national comprehensive energy hub, mainly consisting of wind power bases and photovoltaic bases. New energy bases are planned for the area.

;

; However, the intermittent nature and volatile characteristics of wind power and photovoltaic power pose challenges to the safe and stable operation of the grid.

;

; Xu Hongwei, general manager and deputy Party secretary of State Grid Xinyuan Xinjiang Hami Pumped Storage Co, said that as a result of these factors, work has started on the Hami Pumped Storage Power Station.

;

; "For the grid, a pumped storage power station acts as a 'superpower bank'. When the grid faces high demand, the power station releases water from the reservoir to generate electricity and ensure a stable supply," Xu said.

;

; "During periods of low demand, the power station uses off-peak electricity to pump and store energy. This unique advantage promotes the consumption of new energy, effectively mitigates fluctuations in generating this energy, reduces wind and solar power stoppages, improves the efficiency of generating new energy, and maintains the stable operation of the power grid."

;

; The power station is being built alongside the Sandaogou River in Tianshan township, Yizhou district, Hami. As water will be introduced downstream into the Shichengzi Reservoir, this poses challenges for water protection and maintaining high environmental standards.

;

; "Since the water source for the power station is Hami's primary production and domestic water source, the construction process involves disposing of industrial and domestic wastewater to the highest standards, with additional investment exceeding 100 million yuan ($13.6 million)," Xu said.

;

; Yan Kai, deputy director of the Hami Development and Reform Commission, said, "We are also employing local villagers and herdsmen, promoting grassland restoration, and striving to achieve the green construction goal of protecting source water quality for the extremely arid Hami region.

;

; "Since the project was implemented, vegetation near the power station has increased and improved significantly, and the groundwater level has also risen to some extent."

;

; The power station, which is scheduled to be fully operational in 2028, has a designed annual generation capacity of nearly 1.37 billion kilowatt-hours. This capacity can reduce coal consumption by about 239,000 metric tons and carbon dioxide emissions by 596,000 tons annually, contributing to carbon peak and carbon neutrality goals being achieved.

;

; ;Costs reduced;

;

; Located 160 km north of the East Tianshan Mountains, Naomao Lake town in Yiwu county, Xinjiang, nestles deep in the vast Gobi Desert, sharing borders with Mongolia to the north and east.

;

; The area has abundant sunlight, a dry climate, and a vast difference between daytime and nighttime temperatures. It is known for a forest that covers some 31,333 hectares and for the production of high-quality Hami melons, which are recognized domestically and internationally.

;

; The late-maturing Hami melon cultivation area covers about 2,667 hectares, yielding fruit of exceptional shape, color, texture and high commercial value.

;

; Wei Bin, 34, a villager with nearly 20 hectares of melon fields, said: "We use sheep manure as organic fertilizer in our fields, and the soil's high nutrition levels result in exceptional Hami melons. We earn an average income of about 4,000 yuan from every 0.066 of a hectare, and this year's crop of melons has already been ordered by merchants from various areas."

;

; By promoting the use of membrane drip irrigation systems and using irrigation methods controlled by a smartphone app, overall water costs have been reduced by 30 percent. In addition, increasing the frequency of irrigation while reducing the amount of water used for this purpose has improved the crispness and color of the melons.

;

; Zhang Mingsheng, a member of the Naomao Lake Town Party Committee, said, "Naomao Lake-branded Hami melons are exported to countries such as Vietnam through e-commerce channels.

;

; "The melon industry in Hami will develop melon wine and freeze-dried products, improve the industry's market-oriented management, stabilize prices, and increase melon farmers' incomes."

;

; The Hami melon cultivation base, which completed the transition to membrane drip irrigation in 2001, has saved 175 million cubic meters of water over 22 years, equivalent to the total water volume of Tianchi in the Tianshan Mountains. This initiative not only ensures the groundwater level remains stable, but also provides vital support for development of the coal and chemical industries in Yiwu.

;

; In the first half of this year, Yiwu county's GDP reached 11.52 billion yuan, a year-on-year rise of 31 percent.

;

; ;Mountain divide;

;

; Hami is divided into northern and southern areas by the Tianshan Mountains. In the southern area, fertile land and the Gobi Desert converge, while the northern area features forests, grasslands, snowcapped mountains and glaciers. As a result, Hami is a microcosm of Xinjiang, as it can experience four seasons in a single day and different weather conditions within a 16-kilometer radius.

;

; Barkol Kazakh autonomous county in the north, located next to Yiwu, is home to a landscape rich in snow-capped mountains, forests, grasslands and lakes. Viewed from the Gaojiahu Wetland Scenic Area, the distant Tianshan Mountains are covered with snow and ice, while rivers and lakes dot the grassland. This ecosystem not only serves as a habitat for birds such as gray geese and ruddy shelducks, but also attracts tourists from across China.

;

; The scenic area, which is located in the northern part of Shirenzi township, Barkol county, and covers 59,400 hectares, is one of the country's most important wetlands.

;

; Poverty that existed in the area more than a decade ago, when there was dust on sunny days and deep mud when it rained, has long disappeared.

;

; Bumpy and muddy roads have been transformed into smooth belts of asphalt, and low-rise, dilapidated adobe houses replaced by comfortable, well-equipped rural-style homes. Villagers not only enjoy a pleasant environment, but also increased employment opportunities.

;

; Since 2021, with an investment of 31 million yuan from Henan province as part of its assistance to Xinjiang, construction projects such as sightseeing corridors, wooden walkways, and water recreational facilities have been implemented in the Gaojiahu Wetland Scenic Area.

;

; These projects have comprehensively expanded and improved infrastructure in the area, significantly enhanced living conditions for farmers and herdsmen, and improved the quality of tourist services.

;

; In addition, more than 300 local jobs have been created, and employment indirectly generated for over 1,200 people — consolidating the achievements made in poverty alleviation, and serving as an ideal example of rural revitalization.

;

; Jiang Xiaoliang, secretary of the Party Group and deputy director of the Cultural, Sports, Broadcasting, Television and Tourism Bureau in Barkol, said, "The assistance received from Henan has greatly broadened our construction ideas.

;

; "Fish ponds in this area used to be surrounded by saline-alkaline soil, but now we have built accommodations from which to view the stars at night, with the first floor used for lodging and the second floor for barbecues.

;

; "French windows offer views of the beautiful lake, which are very popular among tourists. Last year, the scenic area received nearly 700,000 visitors, each spending an average of 268 yuan. Tourism income exceeded 200 million yuan, and locals are now earning more."

;

; Ma Xianghui, deputy secretary of Barkol County CPC Committee and commander of Henan Assistance to Xinjiang Command in Barkol County, said, "For the next step, we will better implement the concept of 'green mountains and clear waters are as valuable as mountains of gold and silver', protect the environment of Gaojia Lake, improve the level of tourist services, attract more visitors, and help villagers sustainably increase their income."

; Fri, 03 Nov 2023 04:21:05 +0800 003TOP NEWS - Experts welcome nation's financial-opening pledgehttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/03/content_003_6543fb46ed50d203d2ca1cc6.htm#003TOP NEWS
;
;

; China will remain committed to opening its financial industry and market despite a more turbulent global financial landscape, a point that was reiterated at a recent high-profile meeting, experts said on Thursday.

;

; Among the key focuses of the country's financial opening-up in the coming years would be further aligning domestic regulations and standards with global standards, better managing risks related to cross-border capital flows and steadily advancing renminbi internationalization.

;

; They said that such efforts will reinforce a win-win scenario whereby global financial institutions capitalize on China's vast growth opportunities, while the country's financial sector can achieve high-quality development to better support its modernization endeavors.

;

; Their comments came after the central financial work conference that concluded on Tuesday. The meeting highlighted the importance of promoting high-standard financial opening-up while ensuring national financial and economic security.

;

; It was decided at the conference that China should steadily expand institutional opening-up in the financial sector, facilitate cross-border investment and financing and attract more foreign financial institutions and long-term capital to invest and operate in the country.

;

; The People's Bank of China, the nation's central bank, stressed at a meeting on Thursday the need to steadily advance financial market institutional opening-up, vowing to deepen reform and opening-up of the foreign exchange market and expand financial market connectivity between the Chinese mainland and Hong Kong.

;

; "All of this signals that the momentum of accelerated financial opening-up in recent years will continue," said Wang Qing, chief macroeconomic analyst at Golden Credit Rating International.

;

; Wang said he expects efforts to focus on advancing institutional opening-up, which means that rules, regulations, management and standards in financial industries and markets would become more in line with global norms and encourage more foreign financial institutions to expand business in China.

;

; Recognizing that China has already taken essential steps to open up its financial industries, Achim Kassow, a member of the board of management at Munich Re, a German reinsurer, said further improved clarity on regulations and acceptance of global business models would provide a more predictable business environment.

;

; China has rolled out a series of financial opening-up measures since 2018, including removing ownership caps in the fund management and securities industries. According to the China Securities Regulatory Commission, nine securities companies with foreign majority stakes and nine wholly foreign-owned fund management companies have been approved to operate in China.

;

; Pan Yuanyuan, an associate researcher at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences' Institute of World Economics and Politics, said that while deepening institutional financial opening-up would help China attract more long-term capital, the associated risks regarding cross-border capital flows should be well addressed.

;

; "It is crucial to guard against the negative impact of short-term speculative money, which can flow in and out quickly and in large amounts, reducing its shock to the economy and financial markets," Pan said.

;

; Global financial market volatility has intensified amid major central banks' sharp monetary tightening to curb inflation and a rise in geopolitical tensions, with the onshore renminbi weakening by 5.27 percent against the US dollar so far this year to 7.3179 as of Thursday evening.

;

; It was stressed at the central financial work conference that the management of foreign exchange markets should be strengthened so that the renminbi exchange rate can remain generally stable at a reasonable and balanced level. The meeting also called for efforts to push forward renminbi internationalization in a cautious and steady manner.

;

; "The overall direction of continuing to internationalize the renminbi remains unchanged," said Lou Feipeng, a researcher at Postal Savings Bank of China.

;

; "The focus going forward should be on facilitating trade and investment, supporting the healthy development of the offshore renminbi markets and enhancing the ability to manage risks under open conditions."

;Zhang Jun, China's permanent representative to the United Nations, introduces the work priorities of the country's rotating presidency of the UN Security Council for November at a news conference at the UN headquarters in New York on Wednesday.

;

; China assumed on Wednesday the rotating presidency of the United Nations Security Council for November with a focus on the Palestine-Israel conflict.

;

; The Palestine-Israel situation tops the Security Council's agenda this month, said Zhang Jun, China's permanent representative to the UN.

;

; "It is imperative to push for a cease-fire and halt the fighting, prevent further civilian casualties, prevent a larger-scale humanitarian disaster and prevent the conflict from spilling over," he told reporters at a news briefing on the work of China's presidency.

;

; The presidency of the Security Council rotates among its 15 members monthly. China last held the rotating presidency in August 2022.

;

; The presidency for November comes amid the criticism the Security Council is facing for its perceived slow response to the ongoing Palestine-Israel conflict.

;

; As of Thursday, the number of Palestinian casualties in the Gaza Strip had passed 9,000, according to the Hamas-run Health Ministry in Gaza. More than 1,400 people in Israel have lost their lives so far, most of them killed in the Oct 7 Hamas attack, Israeli authorities said.

;

; "As the rotating president of the Security Council, China will respond to the calls of the international community and work with all parties concerned to promote responsible and meaningful collective action by the council in a timely manner," Zhang said.

;

; He emphasized that based on the current situation and tasks facing the Security Council and the expectations of all parties, China will "push the Security Council to take action, fulfill its responsibilities under the UN Charter, demonstrate its commitment, promote the easing of tensions and support diplomatic efforts".

;

; "We will urge the Security Council to focus on the root causes, look at the complex problem of the intertwining of the development deficit and the security deficit, and explore ways to solve it from a broader perspective," Zhang said.

;

; "We will also push the Security Council to improve its working methods, strengthen unity and cooperation, enhance its authority and efficiency, and respond more effectively to the current complex situation," he added.

;

; The Security Council will also consider issues related to Syria, Yemen and Bosnia-Herzegovina this month, according to Zhang. It will take action on the UN assistance mission in Sudan, the UN mission in the Central African Republic and the extension of the authorization of sanctions on Somalia, as well as hold its annual regular dialogue with the commissioner of UN peacekeeping police, he said.

;

; Foreign Ministry spokesman Wang Wenbin said on Thursday that China has always been a builder of world peace, a contributor to global development and a defender of the international order.

;

; "China will firmly uphold the international system with the UN at its core, the international order underpinned by international law, and the basic norms governing international relations based on the purposes and the principles of the UN Charter," he said at a regular news conference.
